msg: You continue working through the depths of the cave. As you walk through the corridors you spot something glinting in the shadows.

eventDo: You pick up the item and investigate it.
You decide that whatever it is, it is not worth your time and continue on.

msg: You grab the thing and examine it. It is just a slightly bruised, but still somehwat fresh apple.

eventDo: You slip the apple into your bag and continue on.
The apple is not worth the space it would take up in you bag. You decide to leave it where you found it.
